name: Lorikeet
tagline: Lorikeet is a JQuery plugin to view MS/MS spectra annotated with fragment ions.
body:
Lorikeet is a JQuery plugin to view MS/MS spectra annotated with fragment ions. 
The viewer is interactive with zoom capabilities, selection of fragment types,
switching annotations on and off etc. The plugin can, optionally, also render a MS1 
spectrum below the MS/MS spectrum.
Lorikeet uses a modified version of the [Flot plotting library](www.flotcharts.org) under the [MIT license](http://www.opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.php). 

![Lorikeet](https://farm9.staticflickr.com/8706/16822002624_207aaf577b_o.png)
